publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-360 Bashir Ahmad: India and Pakistan, 60th Anniversary of Independence—That the Parliament congratulates India and Pakistan on the 60th anniversary of their independence from the British Empire; applauds both countries for their many successes over the last 60 years; notes the contribution of Indians and Pakistanis living in Scotland, and hopes that both countries continue to develop and strengthen their relationship with each other. Supported by: Stefan Tymkewycz*, Elaine Murray*, Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Robert Brown*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Robin Harper*, Christina McKelvie*, Keith Brown*, Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*, Des McNulty*, Murdo Fraser*, Liam McArthur*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Ian McKee*, Brian Adam*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-360 India and Pakistan, 60th Anniversary of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2007) Dave Thompson*, Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-360 India and Pakistan, 60th Anniversary of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2007) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-360 India and Pakistan, 60th Anniversary of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2007) Jack McConnell*, Jamie Stone*
